Question: In Newport, this person had met Columbia Records producer George Avakian, who persuaded him to sign with his label.
Hints: This person is regarded as one of the most innovative, influential and respected figures in the history of music.
With Tyson, this person would overcome his cocaine addiction and regain his enthusiasm for music.
Despite all the personal turmoil, the 1950–54 period was actually quite fruitful for this person artistically.
